sentences.sentence: The European Commission wants EU-wide naval exercises involving military and civilian entities to be intensified as soon as possible. This is in large part due to the increased threats to critical infrastructure in the maritime domain, like with offshore wind farms, submarine communication cables and pipelines. In November last year, the North Stream gas pipelines were attacked.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Elton John said Turner was a total legend on record and on stage and he added, we have lost one of the world's most exciting and electric performers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Fellow female singers, including Debbie Harry of Blondie, expressed feelings of gratitude for Turner's trailblazing as a woman in a tough and often discriminatory world of music.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
